person.persName: Rodolphus B. Ratliff (Caldwell County, KY, gunsmith, farmer, and sheriff)

body.p: Princeton, Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Mary J. Knight Ratliff in 1846. Owned four enslaved persons in 1850. Gunsmith in Caldwell County in 1850. Owned eleven enslaved persons in 1860. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1860. Sheriff of Caldwell County in 1862.
